name: XZ-Tank Cannon
effectText:
"X-Head Cannon" + "Z-Metal Tank"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. You can discard 1 card, then target 1 face-down Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target.
